title: Maria Callas in concert: Hamburg, 18 May, 1959 and 16 March, 1962
creator_contributor_role: NDR International TV-Produktions GmbH, production company
abstract: Program 1 (18 May 1959). Tu che invoco con orrore (La vestale) / Gasparo Spontini--Nel di della vittoria io le incontrai (Macbeth) / Giuseppe Verdi--Una voce poco fa (Il barbiere di Siviglia) / Gioacchino Rossini--Tu che le vanita (Don Carlo) / Giuseppe Verdi--Oh! S'io potessi dissipar le nubi (Il pirata) / Vincenzo Bellini. Concert 2 (16 March 1962). De cet affreux combat (Le Cid) / Jules Massenet--Overture (Mireille) / Charles Gounod-- Prelude (Carmen) / Habanera (Carmen) ; Entr'acte (Carmen) ; Seguidilla / Georges Bizet--Overture (La forza del destino) ; Surta e la notte (Emani) / Giuseppe Verdi--Nacqui all'affanno al pianto (La cenerentola) / Gioacchino Rossini--O don fatale, o don crudel (Don Carlo) / Giuseppe Verdi
description: Presenting excerpts from two live stage performances by the famed diva opera singer, Maria Callas, in Hamburg in 1959 and 1962 respectively. This video is an absolute must for lovers of opera combining the musical talents of such composers as Verdi, Bizet, Rossini and Bellini, and all superbly performed by the wonderful Maria Callas, elegant as ever with her distinctive soprano voice and dramatic intensity totally captivating the audience. Her performance is accompanied by the Symphonieorchester des NDR, conducted by Nicola Rescigno (1959) and Georges Pretre (1962). Without commentary or narration.
